input.sentences: at a recent ceremony honoring commanders who had served in location | politicians were introduced to the recipients through a receiving line .
and family members of those who had served under them .
a speech was given and awards were passed out .
then the recipients posed on a balcony for a picture of the event .
output.sentences: These military men have served their country with great distinction and are being honored by a press conference and a dinner.
Numerous congress people took time to stop and personally thank these men for there meritorious service.
The press was happy to get in on the congratulations and also managed to get the answer to some of their questions as well.
One of the gentlemen gave a speech, which was well-received with a round of applause.
The gentlemen posed for a memorable photograph along the top of the staircase.
